name: Riandy Hasan (Yandy)
bio:
Building something new and want to do it right from day one? I help turn ideas into real systems, whether that's a simple website or a large, multi-platform product. Plus, I handle cloud setup, help it scale, and make sure data moves in real time.

Or wrestling with a system that needs migrating? I help teams with vendor-to-self-developed-system migrations, data and cloud migrations, tech stack changes, and observability upgrades.

If you're dealing with those kinds of challenges, let's chat :D

workHistory.description: Worked on the engagement and experimentation platform. I helped marketers reach the right users with personalized campaigns, and helped PMs and engineers make better decisions through A/B testing and experiment data.

Worked on a clinic management system from scratch. I helped clinics run their operations more efficiently by supporting appointments, doctor and clinic management, inventory, and analytics. I also helped reduce the company's cloud costs by migrating the system and data from a third-party vendor to an in-house solution.

Worked on Formi's platform with a focus on security and usability. I helped the company avoid potential issues by conducting a security assessment and identifying authentication vulnerabilities. I also helped users easily book dentist appointments through a web-based reservation system.

Worked on the Pintarnya main website (pintarnya.com). I helped improve the user experience by developing new features, fixing bugs, and revamping the UI. I also helped the company reduce cloud costs by migrating location-based search from Google services to a self-developed solution.
Worked on the admin platform for a Point of Sale (POS) system. I helped restaurants and cafes run their businesses more efficiently by streamlining transactions and daily operations.
